column1: Academic School year starts July 1 thru Jun 30
Student to Teacher Ratio is for students and teachers in public school districts, public academies, and joint maintenance agreement schools.  Charter School data is for reference only.
"Total Teachers" is the full-time equivalent of teachers for grades K-12. This includes subject-specific teachers at all grade levels, as well as special education and regular classroom teachers.
Student to Teacher Ratio is not a measure of average class size.
ESS- A12B (Class and Staffing form) and i4see- BOY
